title: Vending machines : Market share of product categories in the U.S. 2010
summary: This grouped bar chart shows Market share on the Y-axis for 10 different Food Types for 2 groups 2009, and 2010 that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 2 groups, 2010 had the highest Market share in Food Type Packaged cold beverages and 2009 had the lowest Market share in Food Type Bulk vending.
In Food Type Packaged cold beverages, 2010 had the maximum Market share and it saw the lowest in Food Type Bulk vending out of all 10 Food Types.
There is a gap of 560.0 between the highest and lowest Market share found for 2010 in Food Type Packaged cold beverages and Bulk vending.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 10 different Food Types on X-axis for 2 groups 2009, and 2010. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Market share.
Out of all 2 groups, 2010 had the highest Market share in Food Type Packaged cold beverages and 2009 had the lowest Market share in Food Type Bulk vending.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Market share on the Y-axis for 10 different Food Types for 2 groups 2009, and 2010 that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 2 groups, 2010 had the highest Market share in Food Type Packaged cold beverages and 2009 had the lowest Market share in Food Type Bulk vending.
In Food Type Packaged cold beverages, 2010 had the maximum Market share and it saw the lowest in Food Type Bulk vending out of all 10 Food Types.
There is a gap of 560.0 between the highest and lowest Market share found for 2010 in Food Type Packaged cold beverages and Bulk vending.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Market share on the Y-axis for 10 different Food Types for 2 groups 2009, and 2010 that are presented on the X-axis.
Food Type Packaged cold beverages had the maximum Market share among all 2 groups, and it was for 2010. The minimum Market share was observed in Food Type Bulk vending for 2009.
Among all the Food Types, 2010 had the highest Market share in Food Type Packaged cold beverages and lowest Market share in Food Type Bulk vending.
There is a gap of 560.0 between the highest and lowest Market share found for 2010 in Food Type Packaged cold beverages and Bulk vending.
Out of all 2 groups, the highest gap between the maximum and minimum Market share was found in case of 2009.
Averaging all 2 groups 2009, and 2010, the Food Type Packaged cold beverages is the maximum Market share and Cigarettes & Cigars is the minimum Market share.
